entry.title: [softfork proposal] Strict DER signatures
entry.summary: In an email exchange on January 21st, 2015, Douglas Roark provided feedback to Pieter regarding a paper, which Pieter responded to with gratitude and some clarifications. The feedback consisted of three points: a typo in the first sentence of "Deployment," the need for clearer comments in the code regarding the sighash byte in IsDERSignature(), and confusion about the handling of a signature with size=0 not being valid but still coded correctly. Pieter made corrections to address these concerns, including renaming the function to IsValidSignatureEncoding and expanding comments about the signature with size=0.
